title: Remote Language Education Design Utilizing Internet-Based Tools

context.additional_context: Blended Tele-Education Framework for Novice Professionals in Medical/Legal/Technical Fields: Language Skill Enhancement

learning_goals: Learners perform real-time language feedback at least three times using internet-based collaboration tools (e.g., Google Docs, Padlet)
Learners practice job-related role-playing at least twice via videoconferencing systems (e.g., Zoom)
Learners enhance self-directed learning skills by submitting weekly learning journals at least four times on an LMS (Learning Management System)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
